name: Actor Tycoon 2
description:
Hollywood -- here we go! Are you ready to take the show business by storm and become the true power behind the curtain, the agent of the best stars of the film industry? Build your own talent agency in Actor Tycoon 2, the actor agent tycoon management/simulation game! Choose to focus on films, theater or TV, build your business from scratch and hire novel actors to guide them to success until you are ready to take on the biggest superstars.

Gain recognition within the film industry, make connections with studio executives and gain the heart of the most talented directors showing them no one knows more about movies than you do. Unlock new skills as the agency grows and find your actors roles that suit their talents -- but be ready to make them happy and keep them out of trouble in hundreds of random events!



Actor Tycoon 2 is the sequel of the successful mobile game Actor Tycoon. The game expands upon the unique formula that made the first game a surprise hit: an easy-to-grasp but deep gameplay, hundreds of random events and characters to make every playthrough unique, featuring the unique quirks and peculiarities of the film industry. Get ready for Actor Tycoon 2: there’s no business like show business!

CREATE YOUR OWN AGENCY

Choose a city to establish your actor agency, customize your character and embark on a journey of fame and success in show business. Start with a small agency with a handful of amateur actors and become a renowned celebrity agent.

EXPAND YOUR AGENCY

Improve your agent skills, hire famous actors, befriend successful directors and contact major studios.

TURN AN UNKNOWN ACTOR INTO A STAR

Hire young aspiring actors, book them for gigs and arrange auditions. Build and maintain your relationships with actors by keeping them happy. Grow your actors’ fan base and watch them win awards and recognition.

WORK IN FILM, TV OR THEATER

Choose between film, TV or theater for a unique playing experience. Each industry offers different salaries, contract lengths, fan base and genre specialization.

CHOOSE GENRE

Each genre pays differently and takes into consideration actors’ looks and talent differently. If an actor likes the genre it also provides additional professional satisfaction.

NEGOTIATE COMMISSIONS

Get better conditions by learning new skills, building better relationships and gaining a good reputation.

ATTEND EXCLUSIVE EVENTS AND PARTIES

Interact with actors, famous directors and studios, mingle with celebrities, grow your network, recruit new actors, find out about new projects and auditions.

BUILD RELATIONSHIPS

Build relationships with actors, directors and studios by talking to them during events, supporting their projects.

SAVE YOUR ACTORS FROM TROUBLE

Manage actors' reputation, get them out of tricky situations - dispel rumors, improve public image, participate in promotions and social events.

IMPRESS DIRECTORS

Show your trivia knowledge to increase your relationships with directors.
